channel.description: Recent content in image on Just a Memo

item.title: Imagemagick
item.description: Take photo with iphone Take photo and adjust selection by iphone upload to linux by weixin browser convet jpeg to bmp by Imagemagick if error mogrify -set comment 'Extraneous bytes removed' *.jpg Corrupt JPEG data: 1130 extraneous bytes before marker 0xd9for i in *.jpg; do convert ${i} ${i%jpg}bmp; done vectorization potrace -i *.bmp -s
